title: #16 Bergdahl, Ted Cruz and Guest Mark Rippetoe!
description: This week we're joined by world-famous coach, Mark Rippetoe to discuss strength training and how it relates to American politics. We get into Bergdahl (traitor or hero, listen to find out!, Ted Cruz's recent announcements, and some pitfalls of Spring Break that you may want to avoid!
